name: Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc.
description: Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. is a global leader in retail pharmacy and well-being, with a mission to champion the health and well-being of every community in the world. Formed in 2014 from the merger of Walgreens and Alliance Boots, it operates over 18,500 locations in more than 25 countries. Walgreens serves as a vital healthcare partner, offering pharmacy services, health and wellness products, and beauty items. The company is committed to delivering accessible healthcare solutions, including immunizations and health screenings, while also expanding its digital offerings through the Walgreens app and website. Walgreens Boots Alliance is also a significant player in the pharmaceutical wholesale market through its subsidiary, McKesson Corporation. The company focuses on innovation, sustainability, and community engagement, ensuring that it meets the evolving needs of consumers. With a strong presence in both brick-and-mortar stores and online, Walgreens aims to enhance the customer experience and improve health outcomes across the globe.

seo.meta_title: Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. | Retail Pharmacy and Healthcare
seo.meta_description: Explore Walgreens Boots Alliance, a leader in retail pharmacy, health and well-being. Discover our community-focused healthcare solutions and innovative retail experience.

faq.question: What services does Walgreens provide?
faq.answer: Walgreens provides pharmacy services, health and wellness products, and beauty items.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Walgreens Boots Alliance?
faq.answer: The CEO of Walgreens Boots Alliance is Rosalind Brewer.

faq.question: Where is Walgreens headquartered?
faq.answer: Walgreens is headquartered in Deerfield, Illinois, USA.
